title: World Missions 2017

replies.body: If you have the Worlds mission pass, you should be 3/4 for completing all of this week's missions.  You'll be able to get 4/4 once Week 2 activates.  If you've already completed the missions but not on 3/4, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see what happened with you.
